title: Upvote if you are that one guy
body:
That opens league client , but then goes to watch countless numbers of vids and  music in youtube and  browsing  reddit/Fb/boards , looking for new PBE  updates , watching streams .
Afk in lobby xD

replies.body: We are that one guy
We are... the Legion

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/masseffect/images/7/7e/Legionstanding_pc.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110131161253

Sorry I'm just playing ME2 right now...
Shepard-Commander
Does this unit have a soul?
Yes ;w; Keelah Se'lai you glorious bastard

We....are groot
http://nerdist.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/121914_GuardiansoftheGalaxy_GrootFigure.jpg
Or when you look back at the client and you have like 5 missed game invites. {{summoner:3}}

i never have that feeling
i dont have friends

after every coop-bot games i click add person to each person. my list is ENDLESS.
plus it feels like i have a bunch of friends
http://fsymbols.co/pictures/6/not-sure-if-i-have-friends-at-all-funny-meme-picture-6351.jpg
They're way too subtle on the new client.

*Sigh*

Take this damn Upvote.
-Queues for Mid/Bot, opens YT to watch a full Minecraft Let's Play episode-
-finishes entire series, still not in match, starts up Lost-
Doing this now -.- you fuckin got me
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2QOUQtx5YgQ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2QOUQtx5YgQ)
I am being that one guy right now...
That's exactly the epitome of "love the game, but hate playing it" xD.
Thought you were gonna say "and wonder why videos sound so weird until you remember youre still in login"

Now only if the new client wasn't laggy or is as CPU-intensive as the old one...

I'd do it anyways.

And it isn't!
That was the point of an update. Have you checked memory usage?
Adobe Air definitely uses a lot more resources.
I am not that guy, but I have people on my friends list who do that.
I almost upvoted, but then I remembered that this post was a violation of international law.

> a violation of **intergalactic** law

FTFY
Guilty.

I have a friend who's always getting AFK penalties, so I just watch an episode of an anime I haven't seen yet. Right now I'm on Soul Eater episode 8. Once I finally get into a match with him, he goes AFK in the first 10 minutes, and we get utterly destroyed.

I have great friends.
doing it right now...
That moment when you realise that you don't know why you even play this game anyore...

BITCH YOU DONT KNOW ME
...
.
.
.
.
okay you know me
Yeah...guilty as charged. So easy to forget that I actually intended to play a game or two.
I do this when I need a break from this community
In other words, over 3/4 of the people who play the game?
What do you mean that League of Legends isn't a multitask on YT/reddit simulator?  It's a game called MOBA?

>Upvote if you are that 184th guy

FTFY
Oh thank God, I'm not the only one XD
https://i.imgflip.com/96bwf.jpg

you could say alot of us space out.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jItnCGRsMjw
Every time

To be honest, i do that before only because of one reason:

The New Client forces me to start it up and then go to the Legacy client and start that up. It takes too long and i don't want to use the New one before it gets optimized. So no, i'm not that guy although i used to be. :(

I have played a lot of Minecraft and other Steam games while in lobby.
Happy that I upgraded some parts on my PC this year and can actually manage it.
Just don't even log in you cancerous twats
